A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the best Star Wars movies with some controversial passages.

Due to the fact that I am a 90s kid\, I did not watch the OT in cinema and therefore maybe never felt what the kids in the 70s felt.

The movie has some weird scenes and at times there are way too much jokes. Despite of that\, I felt more Star Wars than I felt watching Episode I\, II\, VI and VII.

My fear that "The Last Jedi" would be a "Empire Strikes Back" 2.0. was ungrounded.

For me "Tha Last Jedi" is currently the best Episode-movie (without Rogue One) Star Wars movie alongside "The Empire Strikes Back". :)
